txt.en: You're on a mount and can move much faster. Combat may knock you off if you're stunned or otherwise hit hard. To dismount, toggle off your riding skill or right-click on the mount interface and select 'dismount'.

You're on a mount and can move much faster. Combat may knock you off if you're stunned or otherwise hit hard. To dismount, toggle off your riding skill or right-click on the mount interface and select 'dismount'.
